mapper.select: select p.pd_id, pd_name, mdl_name, mn_img_fn, pd_ad_cmt, pd_is_show, pd_chr_cd, pd_type_cd, pd_stat_hist_cd, max_rtl_prc, max_sls_prc, p.last_mod_dt from ( select * from prd where pd_chr_cd like "%N%" and pd_stat_hist_cd like "onSale" and pd_is_show like "Y" ) as p, ( SELECT pd_id, MAX(rtl_prc) AS max_rtl_prc, MAX(sls_prc) AS max_sls_prc FROM stk GROUP BY pd_id ) as pp where p.pd_id = pp.pd_id order by last_mod_dt desc limit 4
